body_html:
Actually, right now we haven't switched to use at::allocator(still using GetStaticContext()->New), so I believe we cannot use the at::Device?
I agree that once we eliminated StaticContext, we can use at::Device to query for device_id.
This is more of an intermediate state, I just want to do this step by step.(Or maybe I should remove New() first before this one?)

body:
Actually, right now we haven't switched to use at::allocator(still using GetStaticContext()->New), so I believe we cannot use the at::Device?
I agree that once we eliminated StaticContext, we can use at::Device to query for device_id.
This is more of an intermediate state, I just want to do this step by step.(Or maybe I should remove New() first before this one?)
